########################################################
# group
	group chain  molecule  1
200 atoms in group chain
	group drug   type      2
200 atoms in group drug
	group cation type      3
200 atoms in group cation
	group anion  type      4
200 atoms in group anion

	set type 1 charge  -1.0
  200 settings made for charge
	set type 2 charge   1.0
  200 settings made for charge
	set type 3 charge   1.0
  200 settings made for charge
	set type 4 charge  -1.0
  200 settings made for charge

	region insregion block  EDGE EDGE EDGE EDGE 45 50
########################################################
	# Dreiding potential information

	bond_style      harmonic
	bond_coeff	    * 128 ${ljcut}
	bond_coeff	    * 128 1.12246204830937

	angle_style     harmonic
	angle_coeff	    1  0.0    180
	angle_coeff	    2  0.0    180

	pair_style hybrid/overlay lj/cut ${ljcut} coul/long  10.0
	pair_style hybrid/overlay lj/cut 1.12246204830937 coul/long  10.0
	pair_coeff * * lj/cut 1.0 1.0
	pair_coeff 1 1 lj/cut 1.0 1.0  # 2.5
	pair_coeff 2 2 lj/cut 3.0 1.0  2.5
	pair_coeff * * coul/long

	dielectric 1.0

	kspace_style pppm 1.0e-3

	special_bonds  lj 0.0 1.0 1.0
  2 = max # of 1-2 neighbors
  2 = max # of 1-3 neighbors
  4 = max # of 1-4 neighbors
  6 = max # of special neighbors

	#####################################################


	dump   1 all custom ${dumpstep} ${simname}.${stopstep}.lammpstrj id type x y z ix iy iz
	dump   1 all custom 10000 ${simname}.${stopstep}.lammpstrj id type x y z ix iy iz
	dump   1 all custom 10000 bottlebrush.${stopstep}.lammpstrj id type x y z ix iy iz
	dump   1 all custom 10000 bottlebrush.1000000.lammpstrj id type x y z ix iy iz
	restart  ${restartstep} restart.*
	restart  200000 restart.*

	velocity  all create   0 1231
	fix		1 all nve      #/limit 0.05
	fix		2 all langevin ${tempur} ${tempur}  10.0 904297
	fix		2 all langevin 1 ${tempur}  10.0 904297
	fix		2 all langevin 1 1  10.0 904297

#	fix 	3 drug gcmc 100 10 10 2 29494 ${tempur} ${drugmu} 0.01 region insregion charge 1.0  full_energy # mol gas
	fix     4 chain  recenter 0.0 0.0 0.0

	#####################################################
	compute_modify thermo_temp dynamic yes
	thermo_style	custom step  temp pxx pyy pzz vol pe  # epair ebond eangle edihed  lx ly lz  dt
	thermo          $(v_dumpstep)
	thermo          10000


	variable time_step         	equal   step
	variable po_total   		equal   pe
	variable po_pair    		equal   epair
	variable po_vdwl          	equal   evdwl
	variable po_coul          	equal   ecoul
	variable po_bond    		equal   ebond
	variable po_angle   		equal   eangle
	variable temp_inst         	equal   temp
	variable num_atoms         	equal   atoms

	thermo_modify norm no
	fix output all print $(v_dumpstep/10) "${time_step} ${temp_inst} ${num_atoms} ${po_vdwl} ${po_coul} ${po_bond} ${po_angle}"  file potential.dat screen no
	fix output all print 1000 "${time_step} ${temp_inst} ${num_atoms} ${po_vdwl} ${po_coul} ${po_bond} ${po_angle}"  file potential.dat screen no

	#####################################################

	timestep	    0.01
	run		        ${runtime}
	run		        1000000
PPPM initialization ...
